original_text: Dividing the three hundred men into three companies, he placed trumpets and empty jars in the hands of all of them, with torches inside.
korean_text: 삼백 명을 세 대로 나누어 각 손에 나팔과 빈 항아리를 들리고 항아리 안에는 횃불을 감추게 하고

sentences.original_text: Dividing the three hundred men into three companies
sentences.korean_translation: 삼백 명의 사람을 세 부대로 나누고

sentences.original_text: he placed trumpets and empty jars
in the hands of all of them
